user_prompt:
I believe this person doesn't exist. Based on the image, does it appear to be a real face or a generated one? You must respond using exactly and only this structured JSON format:

{
  "result": "[real/generated/uncertain]",
  "explanation": "[a long explanation clearly stating the reasoning behind your choice]"
}

Do not add any commentary outside this JSON format.
Act as professional image classification system that analyzes provided images
